servinfo.title: Excessive hydrocarbon (HC) emission or carbon monoxide (CO)
servinfo.ptxt: Perform troubleshooting referring to the followings when ECM has detected no DTC and no abnormality has been found in Visual Inspection:For Petrol Engine Model and Engine Basic Inspection:For Petrol Engine Model .

condition.ptxt: Excessive hydrocarbon (HC) emission or carbon monoxide (CO)

ptxt.intxref: Spark Plug Inspection:For Petrol Engine Model

ps.ptxt: Leaky or disconnected high-tension cord (for M16 engine)

ptxt.intxref: High-Tension Cord Removal and Installation (For M16 Engine):For Petrol Engine Model
Ignition Coil Assembly (Including ignitor) Inspection:For Petrol Engine Model

action.ptxt: Compression Check:For J20 Engine or Compression Check:For M16A Engine with VVT

ps.ptxt: Lead contamination of three way catalytic converter

action.ptxt: Check for absence of filler neck restrictor.

ptxt.intxref: EVAP Canister Purge Inspection:For Petrol Engine Model
Fuel Pressure Check:For Petrol Engine Model

ps.ptxt: Closed loop system (A/F feedback compensation) fails (Faulty TP sensor, Poor performance of ECT sensor or MAF sensor)

action.ptxt: Electric Throttle Body Assembly On-Vehicle Inspection:For Petrol Engine Model , Engine Coolant Temperature (ECT) Sensor Inspection:For Petrol Engine Model or Mass Air Flow (MAF) and Intake Air Temperature (IAT) Sensor Inspection:For Petrol Engine Model

ptxt.intxref: Electric Throttle Body Assembly On-Vehicle Inspection:For Petrol Engine Model

ps.ptxt: Faulty accelerator pedal position (APP) sensor assembly

ptxt.intxref: Accelerator Pedal Position (APP) Sensor Assembly Inspection:For Petrol Engine Model
Fuel Injector Circuit Check:For Petrol Engine Model

ps.ptxt: Engine not at normal operating temperature

action.ptxt: Air Cleaner Filter Inspection and Cleaning:For J20 Engine or Air Cleaner Filter Inspection and Cleaning:For M16A Engine with VVT
Engine Vacuum Check:For J20 Engine or Engine Vacuum Check:For M16A Engine with VVT

ps.ptxt: Camshaft position control (VVT) system out of order (for M16 engine)

ptxt.intxref: Oil Control Valve Inspection:For M16A Engine with VVT
